abstract: A possible combination of the German truck and diesel engine manufacturer and its Swedish rival could bring them more fully under the wing of Volkswagen.
snippet: A possible combination of the German truck and diesel engine manufacturer and its Swedish rival could bring them more fully under the wing of Volkswagen.
lead_paragraph: MAN Group, the German truck and diesel engine manufacturer, and its Swedish rival Scania are talking about a possible combination, the companies said Monday, a deal that would bring them more fully under the wing of Volkswagen.

headline.main: MAN and Scania in Merger Talks
